rules_text:
X can't be 0.
Ugin enters with a +1/+1 counter for each type of mana spent to cast him. [i]({W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, {G}, and {C} are the types of mana)[/i]
When Ugin enters, manifest hope X times, then draw a card. [i](To manifest hope, look at the top two cards of your library, manifest one of them, and put the other on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
